text: A Gun in Each Hand () is a 2013 Spanish comedy film directed by Cesc Gay. == Cast == * Javier Cámara as S. * Ricardo Darín as G. * Eduard Fernández as E. * Jordi Mollà as M. * Eduardo Noriega as P. * Leonor Watling as María * Alberto San Juan as A. * Leonardo Sbaraglia as J. * Luis Tosar as L. * Cayetana Guillén Cuervo as Sara * Candela Peña as Mamen == References == == External links == * Category:2013 comedy films Category:Spanish films Category:Spanish comedy films Category:Films directed by Cesc Gay
title: A Gun in Each Hand
